content.raw: So I ended up fixing a couple of minor points brought up by Carlos on top of the work Jose did.  I think we can now move forward with this, though we obviously want to merge Jose's version of the branch.  What is the best thing to do here?  Close this PR, and open a new one from the remove-boost-8_jrivero branch?  Do something else?
